actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to authorize the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to regulate the issuance and sale of debt obligations by bank holding companies and their subsidiaries.

summary.text: Authorizes the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to regulate the issuance and sale of debt obligations by bank holding companies and their subsidiaries. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1842)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to authorize the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to regulate the issuance and sale of debt obligations by bank holding companies and their subsidiaries.
